DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , 2-arm Phase II study assess safety & efficacy bortezomib combination Avastin patient recurrent glioblastoma multiforme ( gbm ) . 56 total patient recurrent WHO grade IV malignant glioma enrol study . Avastin administer intravenously dose 15 mg/kg every 3 week . Bortezomib administer day 1 , 4 , 8 , 11 , 22 , 25 , 29 , & 32 42-day cycle . The dose bortezomib 1.7 mg/m2 non-EIAED patient & 2.5 mg/m2 EIAED patient . Treatment continue either evidence progressive disease , unacceptable toxicity , non-compliance study follow-up / withdrawal consent . Brain MRIs obtain every cycle . Bortezomib administration associate mild toxicity patient , fatigue , diarrhea & nausea , constipation & peripheral neuropathy . Less common , bortezomib administration lead significant hematologic toxicity & peripheral neuropathy . Most significant toxicity associate Avastin recently complete phase II clinical trial Duke thrombotic complication & grade 2 proteinuria . `` Unacceptable '' toxicity rate 15 percent less consider desirable , rate 40 percent great consider undesirable . The statistical hypothesis need test differentiate 15 % & 40 % rate unacceptable toxicity .
